special_text:
Whenever a noncreature permanent you control becomes a creature, draw a card.
[+2]: Until your next turn, target artifact you control becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. If it's a Vehicle, put two +1/+1 counters on that creature. Otherwise, it has base power and toughness 2/2 until end of turn.
[-3]: Each player plays with the top card of their library revealed this turn. You may play artifact and colorless cards revealed this way. [i](Land cards are colorless.)[/i]
